subject: Why bother?
msgSnippet: Help me out, please - I m trying to market JUnit to my team. The most common objection I get goes along the line of what advantage will I get out of this,
messageBody:
Help me out, please -

I'm trying to "market" JUnit to my team. The most common objection I get goes along the line of "what advantage will I get out of this, when writing my code? I have my test class, w/ its main(..) method, and that's all I need."
Even though people are willing to see the advantage of a unit testing framework for the long term project development, that want to see "personal value".

- Yishay
         Yishay Mor
         Cisco systems, EMBU Israel  (QPM project)
         work  +972-9-9700031      home +972-4-6396602
